rukus.text: Ha, mi mu [alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] shi cong quanneng de, zui ruizhi de an la jiang shi de.
Dui xinshimen, tiandi jian que you xuduo jixiang.
Zai nimen de chuangzao zhong, yiji ta [zai dadishang] sanbu de ge zhong dongwu zhong, dui duxin de minzhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Zhouye de lunliu, an la cong tiankong jiangxia jiyang [yushui], jie ci er shi kusi de da di fusu, yiji fengxiang de gaibian, dui neng mingli de minzhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Zhexie shi an la de jixiang, wo yi zhenli xiang ni [mu sheng] xuandu. Zai [fouren] an la he ta de jixiang hou, tamen yao xinyang shenme yanci ne?
Mei ge zaoyao zhe, fanzui zhe jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!

Dang ta [zaoyao zhe, fanzui zhe] tingjian youren xiang ta songdu an la de qishi shi, ta jiu aoman de guzhi jijian, haoxiang ta meiyou tingjian yiyang, ni dang xiang ta xuanbu [ta bi shou] tongku de xingfa.
Mei dang ta liaojie wo de yixie qishi [“gulanjing”] shi, ta jiu ba ta dang xiaobing. Zhexie ren bi shou lingru de xingfa.

Zai tamen de qianmian [he houmian dou] you huo yu [zhu], tamen suo zuo de yiqie jiang dui tamen hao wu yichu, tamen she an la er xuan bai de baohu zhe dui tamen ye jiang hao wu yichu. Tamen jiang shou zhongda de xingfa.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi zhinan, bu xinyang tamen de zhu de qishi zhe, tamen jiang shou tongku de chengfa.
